Package org.terrier.applications.desktop

Provides an Java Swing application, based on Terrier, that can be used for searching the desktop of a user.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AboutTerrier
    The about dialog for the desktop search application.
    DesktopTerrier
    An application that uses the Terrier IR platform, in order to search the desktop of a user.
    HelpDialog
    Shows a simple help dialog for the desktop application.
    IndexFolders
    The dialog used for selecting the folders to index in the desktop terrier application.

Package org.terrier.applications.desktop Description

Provides an Java Swing application, based on Terrier, that can be used for searching the desktop of a user. The application can index a range of different file types, such as HTML and PDF documents, as well as Microsoft Word, Excel and Powerpoint documents.
